author: mikeneuder
content: hello! circling back here post-ethDenver. trying to get a pulse check on how the channel feels on the viability of IL inclusion in electra. from the breakout call we had a few weeks ago it feels like the technical details are well understood and that most of what is needed is just a decision on if we are going for it or not. what can i do in the coming weeks to help us come to a decision on that front ? does it make sense to prototype in a client? do we need to finalize the specs first? just trying to fill any gaps!
